A '''guster banner pattern''' is a [[banner pattern]] used to customize [[banner]]s with the appearance of a [[breeze]]. It can only be found in [[trial chambers]] and cannot be [[crafted]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|guster-banner-pattern}}

== Usage ==
=== Loom ingredient ===
Guster banner patterns are used in [[loom]]s to add customization to [[banner]]s. The pattern must be combined with 1 banner and 1 [[dye]]. Upon usage in the loom, the guster banner pattern is not consumed.

{{Looming
|showdescription=1
|ingredients={{:Banner/recipe|ingredients}}
|{{:Banner/recipe|banner}}
|Matching Dye
|Guster Banner Pattern
|Guster
|{{:Banner/recipe|output|Guster}}
|Blink=Banner
|Olink=Banner
|description=Emblazons a guster (breeze body)
}}
